Title: Deepen the criticism of Deng Xiaoping, strike against the right deviationist wind of reversing verdicts
Publisher: Guangdong renmin chubanshe (广东人民出版社)
Notes: Deng Xiaoping makes a come-back in the Party leadership in 1973. In the 1976 "campaign to Criticize Rightist Deviationism", the last great mass movement of the Cultural Revolution, he is dismissed again. The battle for the succession of Mao, 82 years old and seriously ill, has broken out.
